description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in index.cfm in SSPwiz Plus 1.0.7 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the message parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-3081

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-3082

NOTE: this is a different issue than CVE-2006-3059.
